name: Healing Hearts
description:
Create your own vlog with daily video prompts and keep track of your emotions, thoughts and stories.

- 30 Daily Video Prompts
- 5 Ways of Wellbeing Puzzles
- 20+ Actions and Model by Mixamo
- 80+ Sticker by Icons8
- 20+ Filters by Cinema Suite
- Music by Mr. Chase

Note: 

- Videos are saved on computer and not uploaded. This app also doesn't collect any data.

- Only supports Windows 10
